title: Illusions Of Peace
lyrics:
The birds of prey gather and smile
Zero horizons, one's chosen mile
Upon these wings
This flight of greed
Walk with me, your new beginning

Religion and creed

The eternal void

Beyond this door

Illusions of peace

Now and forevermore



Your wounds of loss, I shall heal and mend

Where nothing matters and nothing ends



Upon these wings

This flight of greed

Walk with me, your new beginning

Religion and creed

The eternal void

Beyond this door

Illusions of peace

Now and forevermore



Upon these wings

This flight of greed

Walk with me, your new beginning

Religion and creed

The eternal void

Beyond this door

Illusions of peace

Now and forevermore
